title: Speed and acc - block on a inclined plane

content.question: A block is on a surface inclined at angle <math alttext="theta " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Î¸</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> above the horizontal, as shown. The velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and acceleration <math alttext="a " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> vectors are shown. Which of the following best describes the motion of the block at the moment shown?

choices.label: The block is moving up the incline and speeding up.
The block is moving up the incline and slowing down.
The block is moving down the incline and speeding up.
The block is moving down the incline at a constant speed.
The block is moving down the incline and slowing down.

content.answer: The block is moving up the incline and slowing down.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
